message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $22000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it can bring to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $19000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $17000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $17000. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer it to you for $18500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to you.
